info.author: Philip Pavlik ppavlik@memphis.edu
info.abstract: The GLRKT component is an example of a(n) R component.
info.description: This GLRKT component three modes, do crossvalidation.
info.inputs:
plancomponents,fixedpars,seedpars,prespecfeatures,mode
mode - This includes three modes: "best fit model", "five times 2 fold crossvalidated create folds", and "five times 2 fold crossvalidated read folds".
info.outputs:
transaction_file_output.txt-Original input file
temp_pred-The generated that we use for LearningCurveGraph under the mode of best fit model.
model_result_values.xml

options.b: Select which of the modes that can be used
Select some given values for parameters
